game.title: The Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Defeat the Dragon and retrieve the stolen treasure
game.description: The dragon Xanathar has stolen the royal treasure. You are tasked with defeating the dragon and retrieving the treasure.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a magical sword

task.description: Carefully sneak into the dragon's lair hidden in the Treacherous Mountains.
Use your skills and courage to defeat the dragon Xanathar.
Once Xanathar is defeated, retrieve the royal treasure and return it to King Arthur.
